sentences: Ta on väga töökas, lisaks ka andekas.
Eeskava sai läbi, kuid publik nõudis lisa.
Bensiin oli lõpukorral, aga lisa polnud kuskilt saada.
context: The Estonian word 'lisaks' is primarily used as an adverb meaning 'additionally,' 'in addition,' 'besides,' or 'furthermore.' It's commonly used to add information or emphasize that something extra is being mentioned. In some contexts, it can also refer to additional parts of documents (appendices) or supplementary materials.
